title: Life histories: Interpreting the subjective reality of African students studying nursing in the UK.

references.title: African Nights,
references.raw: Gallman, K. (1994) African Nights, Penguin, London.

references.title: Are black nurses an endangered species?
references.raw: Iganski, P. (1998) Are black nurses an endangered species? Nursing Times 94: 36, 54-57.
